description:
Laszlo is here from eastern Europe as a student. He learned English specifically to come to the States and apparently it's done him well. As he says in his interview, his accent is quite popular with the girls. Although he's a bit reticent, I found him very charming with his puppy dog eyes and straightforward honesty.
Laszlo is straight and uncircumcised. When I told him that most of the guys in America are cut, he didn't believe me — and didn't understand why. I asked him why he hadn't noticed that in the showers at his university and he got kind of embarrassed and said he hadn't looked!
title: Laszlo
